definition: all rivers run into the sea/use different means to obtain the same result (idiom)

to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China

sentences.english: Motto is be tolerant to diversity, to take the line away.
sentences.chinese: 校训是海纳百川，取则行远。

sentences.english: Shanghai's urban spirit is Hiner hundred Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 上海的城市精神就是海纳百川。

sentences.english: The seas embraces many rivers to attain greatness, so we especially need an open mind.
sentences.chinese: 海纳百川，有容乃大，因此我们需要开放的心态。

sentences.english: The ocean is vast for it refuses no rivers.
This is Shanghai, a city of tolerance, forgiveness and tremendous absorptive captivity, as the Chinese people have said.
sentences.chinese: 这就是上海，中国人说她善于包容并蓄，海纳百川。
